title: Love Island's Jessica Shears give birth to first baby with Dom Lever
text:
Get the biggest Daily Love Island stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Love Island beauty Jess Shears has given birth to her first baby with her husband Dom Lever.

The 27 year old reality star and her model husband and fellow Islander confirmed the news on Instagram today.

She shared a snap of her bundle of joy's tiny feet and a glimpse of their face in a sweet post, writing: "Baby Lever."

Dom, 27, posted a photo of himself seemingly leaving the hospital with their little one in a car seat.

He said: "Baby we did it."

The pair have yet to reveal the baby's name or gender, or when Jess gave birth.

Jess has been regularly posting up photos of her pregnancy, complaining that she was feeling uncomfortable after going past her due date,

The pair shared the news of their pregnancy in May by posting a photo of the baby's ultrasound scan alongside two Polaroid snaps of them both cradling their bumps. Dom captioned his post, "Living the dream"

Video Loading Video Unavailable Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now

They also shared that thy were told their baby could experience complications due to a rare blood type - RH Negative which also means their baby could develop rhesus disease which leads to anaemia and jaundice.

They waited a while before announcing their baby news, fearing something could have gone wrong but all seems well and good.

Jess and Dom met while both appearing on Love Island 2017 and married on Valentine's Day in 2018 on the Greek Island of Mykonos.

The couple now live in Devon where they are fully committed to each other and their new family member.

description: Love Island's Jess Shears has finally given birth to a healthy baby after going days over her due date
